other_tests.findings: Worsening atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally. No pleural effusions. The liver enhances homogeneously with no focal hepatic mass lesion. Air is seen within the intra and extrahepatic biliary tree from recent ERCP. A small multi-lobulated rim enhancing fluid collection in the gallbladder fossa measuring approximately 3.9 x 1.3 cm. Small to moderate amount of inflammatory fat stranding in the vicinity. Normal pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, and urinary system. No dilated loops of bowel or areas of differential bowel wall enhancement, though loops of bowel in the ascending colon are minimally thick walled, likely reactive. Enlarged prostate gland measuring 5.1 x 3.9 cm. No lymphadenopathy or abdominal aortic aneurysm.
